casebody.data:
Steven Glen SMITH, petitioner,
v.
William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 13-232. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 15, 2013.

Case below, 526 Fed.Appx. 395.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
